name: Exteriores
description: People have traveled through space for a long time. However, such a cavernous space cannot be covered by human reasoning. Due to the fact that space travel has become so popular, the number of people lost in space has increased significantly. The player takes on the role of an agent in organization dealing with leading people lost in space to safety. Plan your journey well, because the space is very treacherous - your worst enemy is gravity and the lack of information. But who if not you - you are the survivors' last hope.
